statements: SELECT * FROM energy_storage_capacity;
SELECT id, energy_consumption FROM energy_storage_capacity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_capacity WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT SUM(energy_generation) AS total_generation FROM energy_storage_capacity;
SELECT id, time(timestamp) AS time_of_day FROM energy_storage_capacity ORDER BY time_of_day ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumption, energy_generation FROM energy_storage_capacity WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT MAX(energy_generation) AS max_energy_generation FROM energy_storage_capacity;
SELECT id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, timestamp, NOW()) AS hours_since_timestamp FROM energy_storage_capacity WHERE energy_generation < 50;

SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption, AVG(energy_generation) AS avg_energy_generation FROM energy_storage_capacity WHERE energy_consumption > 200 GROUP BY id ORDER BY avg_energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumption, energy_generation FROM energy_storage_capacity WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURDATE() ORDER BY energy_generation ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100
SELECT location, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM storage_capacity WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT date, capacity FROM storage_capacity WHERE capacity < 500
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' AND energy_usage > 100
SELECT date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location
SELECT ec.*, sc.capacity FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN storage_capacity sc ON ec.location = sc.location
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption
SELECT * FROM EnergyStorageCapacity;
SELECT date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyStorageCapacity ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_generated) AS avg_energy_generated FROM EnergyStorageCapacity;
SELECT id, date, energy_level, operation FROM EnergyStorageHistory WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT id, date, optimization_strategy, efficiency FROM EnergyStorageOptimization WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, date, energy_consumed, energy_generated FROM EnergyStorageCapacity WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM EnergyStorageHistory ORDER BY energy_level DESC
SELECT date, operation FROM EnergyStorageHistory WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, optimization_strategy, efficiency FROM EnergyStorageOptimization WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT SUM(energy_consumed), SUM(energy_generated) FROM EnergyStorageCapacity
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC, energy_consumed
SELECT date, energy_produced FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE energy_produced > 1000 ORDER BY energy_produced DESC
SELECT storage_id, energy_level, timestamp FROM EnergyStorage WHERE energy_level < 50 ORDER BY energy_level
SELECT date, time, forecasted_demand FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY energy_consumed
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, time, energy_produced FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE date = '2022-06-15' AND time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT date, AVG(energy_level) AS avg_energy_level FROM EnergyStorage GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(energy_level) > 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, MAX(forecasted_demand) AS max_demand FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE date >= '2022-07-01' GROUP BY date ORDER BY max_demand DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT date, time FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed < 50 ORDER BY date ASC, time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT customer_id, consumption_date FROM EnergyProduction ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(consumption_amount) AS max_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUtilization WHERE utilization_amount > 1000;
SELECT optimization_strategy FROM EnergyOptimization WHERE optimization_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_amount > 1000 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, consumption_date FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_amount < 500 ORDER BY production_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT utilization_id, utilization_amount FROM EnergyUtilization WHERE utilization_amount between 200 and 500 ORDER BY utilization_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT storage_id, storage_capacity FROM EnergyStorage ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyOptimization WHERE optimization_strategy LIKE '%efficiency%' ORDER BY optimization_date DESC LIMIT 5;
